meaning_str.bing:
n. 【食,植】蕃茄
网络. 西红柿；番茄；番茄色

番茄；西红柿；番茄植株；番茄色；鲜红色；番茄红；<俚>漂亮女人

1.en: Italy's farmers union, which organised its public launch, said the tomato is free radicals in the body, which can damage human cells.
1.cn: 负责新品推广的意大利农民联盟表示该品种富含番茄红素，这是一种红色素，它含有抗氧化剂。

2.en: When however, the tomato garden has not been able to turn over a new leaf, the copyright big stick fell!
2.cn: 然而，还未等到番茄花园能够“重新做人”，版权的大棒就落下了！

3.en: This time I avoided the mixture of tomato and melted cheese that seems to guarantee all pizza toppings taste the same whatever else you add.
3.cn: 这次，我刻意没用西红柿和融化的芝士，因为它们让所有的匹萨表面吃起来都是一个味儿，不管你再加什么料进去。

0.en: Yes, the humble tomato, the foundation of pizza sauce.
0.cn: 是啊，这小小的番茄，就是披萨酱的基础。

1.en: So if you pass me a bun with some lettuce and tomato, maybe two slices of tomato, and then I can fill them up. That's great.
1.cn: 麻烦拿一个圆面包给我，还有生菜和番茄，大概两片番茄吧，我来加肉，太棒了。

2.en: Ted and his fellow California tomato growers produce close to 13 million tons of them every year.
2.cn: 泰德和其他的加州番茄种植者每年能收获将近一千三百万吨番茄。

3.en: Yeah, okay, you know what no one can argue with there, Tomato?
3.cn: 好吧，你知道大家无法反驳的是什么吗，小番茄？

4.en: Is there any chocolate in any of these? You'll have to scrape it off this sun-dried tomato.
4.cn: 这里面有巧克力吗？你得从这罐番茄干上刮下来。

5.en: Where is the fire, Daddy? Nearly there. Hurray! Easy as pie! Now we can heat up the tomato soup.
5.cn: 火在哪里呀，爸爸？就快有了。好嘞！小菜一碟！现在我们可以加热番茄汤啦。

6.en: Oh, yes. Of course. I've received an envelope full of drawings. This tomato looks very juicy.
6.cn: 噢，是的，当然了。我收到了一封信，里面放了很多画。这个番茄看上去非常好吃。

7.en: Now what happens? Suzy, you are a tomato. Look. I'm a carrot. Oh yes. And I'm a pumpkin.
7.cn: 然后会怎么样呢？苏西，你变成一个番茄了！看呐！我是胡萝卜！噢！没错！我是一个南瓜！

8.en: Lovely. And Pedro? It's a super potato. Oh I see. And George has drawn a wonderful tomato.
8.cn: 真不错！那佩德罗呢？我画的是超级土豆。噢，我知道了。乔治画了一个非常好看的番茄。

9.en: My tummy rumbling is one of the best sounds of nature! It means it's time to eat! I love tomato soup! So do I!
9.cn: 我肚子的声音是大自然最好听的声音之一 ！这意味着该开饭了！我喜欢番茄汤！我也喜欢！

10.en: What if I spill tomato soup on my shirt and have to come home to change only to find there's no water for an enzyme soak?
10.cn: 如果我不小心把番茄汤撒到衣服上怎么办，我必须回家来换结果发现没有水来泡洗衣粉吗？

11.en: What are you eating? Elbow macaroni with ground hamburger and tomato sauce.
11.cn: 你在吃什么？曲管通心粉配牛肉酱和番茄酱。

12.en: Pizza has cheese, tomato sauce, all your favorite stuff. Eat it. You guys need nutrition. Or not.
12.cn: 披萨有芝士，番茄酱，都是你们喜欢的，吃吧，你们需要营养。

13.en: The pickled cabbage adds color and sweetness, but if your kids don't like the idea, you could always use tomato relish.
13.cn: 红甘蓝泡菜可以增加颜色和甜度，但如果你的孩子不喜欢这种创意，你完全可以用番茄酱代替。

14.en: Daddy Pig, you are not supposed to ring on this phone. It's only for emergencies. This is an emergency. I can't find the tomato ketchup anywhere.
14.cn: 猪爸爸，你不应该打这个电话的。这是紧急情况时才使用的。可我就是有紧急情况啊。我到处找不到番茄酱，怎么办啊。

15.en: George, just try a little bit of this lovely tomato. Yuck!
15.cn: 乔治，就试着吃一小口可口的西红柿。讨厌！

16.en: George, just try a little bit of this lovely tomato. Yuck!
16.cn: 乔治，就试着吃一小口可口的西红柿。讨厌！

17.en: George, just try a little bit of this lovely tomato. Yuck!
17.cn: 乔治，就试着吃一小口可口的西红柿。讨厌！

18.en: And I'm going to use a great cheat's shortcut using tomato ketchup for the sauce.
18.cn: 我要使用经典速成方法，用蕃茄酱做酱汁。

19.en: Add the tomato-ey sauce prepared earlier. Roughly chop some greens, spring onions and coriander.
19.cn: 加入先前准备好的蕃茄酱汁，粗粗切一些葱和香菜。
